Name: Forever Space
About the game: Greg Winston and four other crew mates begin a volunteer work program on Space Station Capricorn. Before long, it becomes apparent that something is... off. The station's Overseers become hard to find. The crew mates grow suspicious of one another. Memories are getting lost. Is it just paranoia caused by the isolation, or is there something else going on? FEATURES Interactive sci-fi short story. Classic Point & Click interface. Fully vocalized by talented actors. Powered by the Unity engine.​​ Contains some violence and adult language.
